channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Docker State of App Dev: Dev Ex & Productivity
item.description: Report: What’s helping devs thrive — and what’s still holding them back? A look at how culture, tooling, and habits are shaping the developer experience today, per Docker’s 2025 State of Application Development Survey. Great culture, better tools — but developers often still feel stuck. From pull requests stuck in review to tasks without clear... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-state-of-app-dev-dev-ex-productivity/

item.title: The Docker MCP Catalog: the Secure Way to Discover and Run MCP Servers
item.description: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) ecosystem is exploding. In just weeks, our Docker MCP Catalog has surpassed 1 million pulls, validating that developers are hungry for a secure way to run MCP servers. Today, we're excited to share major updates to the Docker MCP Catalog, including enhanced discovery features and our new open submission process.... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-mcp-catalog-secure-way-to-discover-and-run-mcp-servers/

item.title: Tool Calling with Local LLMs: A Practical Evaluation
item.description: Which local model should I use for tool calling? When building GenAI and agentic applications, one of the most pressing and persistent questions is: “Which local model should I use for tool calling?” We kept hearing again and again, from colleagues within Docker and the developer community, ever since we started working on Docker Model... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/local-llm-tool-calling-a-practical-evaluation/

item.title: Building an Easy Private AI Assistant with Goose and Docker Model Runner
item.description: Goose is an innovative CLI assistant designed to automate development tasks using AI models. Docker Model Runner simplifies deploying AI models locally with Docker. Combining these technologies creates a powerful local environment with advanced AI assistance, ideal for coding and automation. Looking for a seamless way to run AI-powered development tasks locally without compromising on... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/building-an-ai-assistant-with-goose-and-docker-model-runner/

item.title: Docker State of App Dev: AI
item.description: AI is changing software development — but not how you think The hype is real, but so are the challenges. Here's what developers, teams, and tech leaders need to know about AI’s uneven, evolving role in software. Rumors of AI’s pervasiveness in software development have been greatly exaggerated. A look under the hood shows adoption... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-state-of-app-dev-ai/
